shows.title: $50,000 Reward
shows.overview: Tex Sherwood has just come into possession of a valuable piece of land that will be irrigated by a new dam. Banker Holman knowing the deed must be registered the next day, offers a $50,000 reward for Tex's capture.

shows.title: 'Neath Canadian Skies
shows.overview: The Mounties are called in to fight against claim jumpers.

shows.title: 'Neath the Arizona Skies
shows.overview: The cowboy guardian of a half-Native-American girl tries to help her claim her rightful inheritance, fighting outlaws and desperados, along the way.

shows.title: Trinity Is Still My Name
shows.overview: In the process of honoring their father’s dying wish to become famous Old West outlaws, a pair of gunslinging brothers turn into do-gooders instead.

shows.title: Three Bullets for Ringo
shows.overview: A newly blind Ringo must protect his mother from greedy land grabbers and the new town sheriff, who happens to be an old friend with a vendetta.

shows.title: 3 Godfathers
shows.overview: John Wayne stars in this touching western about three half-hearted outlaws who go on the run with an orphaned infant they find in the desert.

shows.title: 3 Tickets to Paradise
shows.overview: AJ Parker, her ex-husband and a federal agent head for a Mexican ghost town called Paradise in search of a hidden cache of 5,000 stolen double eagle $20 gold coins.

shows.title: 30 Seconds in Hell
shows.overview: The gunfighters of the OK Corral are brought back from the grave by the mysterious Destiny and her henchman Sorem to start the battle all over again.

shows.title: 3:10 to Yuma
shows.overview: Dan Evans in need of $200 to build a well learns that he can obtain the money for delivering a notorious outlaw to the state prison in Yuma, Arizona. Ben Wade's gang discovers his whereabouts and Evans is left alone to face the outlaws.

shows.title: 4 for Texas
shows.overview: Frank Sinatra plays a tough guy who hooks up with fellow rat packer Dean Martin to open a casino in this western.

shows.title: 6 Bullets to Hell
shows.overview: When a farmer’s wife is murdered by a ruthless bandit and his gang, a retired gunman hunts them down, one by one, in this old-style spaghetti western.

shows.title: 6 Guns
shows.overview: A young woman enlists the aid of a bounty hunter so she can take revenge on the men who killed her husband and raped her.

shows.title: 7 Faces of Dr. Lao
shows.overview: This film features a tour-de-force performance by Tony Randall in multiple roles, along with amazing visual effects and makeup that make it unique in the history of fantasy cinema.

shows.title: 7 Men from Now
shows.overview: A former sheriff tracks down the seven men responsible for killing his wife during a robbery at a Wells Fargo office.

shows.title: Seven Dollars on Red
shows.overview: A ruthless gang kidnaps a young boy after murdering his family

shows.title: Adios, Hombre
shows.overview: An innocent man gets erroneously convicted of a robbery, and upon his release from prison, he embarks on a mission to find the true culprits.

shows.title: 7th Cavalry
shows.overview: Absent from Custer's Last Stand, an Army captain volunteers for the Little Bighorn burial detail.

shows.title: A Big Hand for the Little Lady
shows.overview: Academy Award-winners Henry Fonda, Joanne Woodward and Jason Robardsstar in this sly comedy about a fateful poker game in the Old West thatresults in A Big Hand For The Little Lady.
shows.originalTitle: A Big Hand for the Little Lady

shows.title: A Cold Day in Hell
shows.overview: After losing his wife and home, an ex-Civil War sharpshooter moves to the Sierra Nevada Mountains and gets embattled in a war against a robber baron.

nextCursor: 2095183:A Cry in the Night: The Legend of La Llorona
